page.title: 18Games in Eckington part2
page.content: {Crispin:-}School games (Bulldogs, Football, Rugby, Stuck-in-the-mud, Pinball, Tag, 50:50, conkers). How to play Ball Tag:-You need three or more people and a light plastic football. In this example I will use four people. One person is on; this means that one person chases the other three. He will try and throw the football at the other three , if he hits one of the other players then that player becomes the thrower. The most popular game played by boys of 9 and 10 is Football, followed by Bulldogs, Tag, Pinball, and Conkers (in season). Home games (Ball Tag, Football, Monopoly, Army, Cards, Darts, Snooker, Tennis, Chess, Cricket, Rebound, 50:50, Stuck-in-the-mud, Conkers). Monopoly is the most common game for boys to play at home.
